channel.title: A few things rep++ if help
channel.description: alright, i have the gfx to where spells need runes to cast, but it uses ecto tokens as bloods, and the numbers are way off, is there a way to change the rune req? second how do i edit what it says under a tele i.e. change varrock tele to al kharid tele and change the description third how come when i spawn a wall using fedexers globals it doesnt spawn anything, but you cant walk in that square as if theres an object there fourth how do i make npcs talk to you, not like over your head but in the chatbox, and give it a yes and no option that does things thanks, im going so pm it to me

1 i have the gfx to where spells need runes to cast, but it uses ecto tokens as bloods, and the numbers are way off, is there a way to change the rune req?

5 how do i make npcs talk to you, not like over your head but in the chatbox, and give it a yes and no option that does things

  2. if you got a colour void search

Teleports you to Varrock", 1301);

item.title: A few things rep++ if help
item.dc:creator: @J112 J
item.description:
@J112 wrote:

Adding global objects depends if it’s a wall decor, a wall, a fancy thing, or anything else.

AddGlobalObject(2857, 9753, 4067, 2, 0);

Here is an example. The first two are the spawn point of where it’ll spawn. The third number is the object id.
The “2” means the direction, and the 0 is a wall object.

Here is a list of what the last number could be.

0-3 wall objects, 4-8 wall decoration, 9: diag. walls, 10-11 world objects, 12-21: roofs, 22: floor decoration

After you have something like the first code, place it in a public void. (public void trainingobject (){ for example)
After that, put “trainingobject():” in case 121 (for me) and place it under it.
Then the object SHOULD spawn.

Changing what the spell says and the description, type ctrl+f and type in

//--Modern--

then find “Varrock” such as

sendQuest("@whi@Level 25 : Varrock Teleport", 1300);
sendQuest("@whi@Teleports you to Varrock", 1301);

and just change what it says.

Read full topic
item.source: A few things rep++ if help

item.title: A few things rep++ if help
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

Changing varrock tele is very easy tbh heres how its done

search for

if (s == "Varrock") { teleX = 3210; teleY = 3424; addSkillXP((20*playerLevel[6]), 6); newheightLevel = 0; }

and change the coords also to change what the tele says search

case 4140: TeleTo("Varrock", 0); ancientstele = false; break;

and change Varrock and it should work =]

hope that helps

metal

Read full topic
